case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_InstallPkg_001
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Enable all built-in MeeGo repos, and force GPG checking for package install
  2. Connect device to Internet via system proxy setting
  3. Perform below package management tasks via MeeGo installation console interface
  • pkcon install Your_pkg

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo installation console interface functions as GUI client applications.
  • Users can be informed with appropriate messages if package management authentication or transaction fails. Installation transaction aborts without making any changes to your system.

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_InstallPkg_002
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify network disconnection can be correctly handled during performing package management with Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Enable all built-in MeeGo repos, and force GPG checking for package install
  2. Disconnect device from Internet
  3. Try to perform below package management tasks via MeeGo installation console interface: pkcon install  your_pkg
  1. Re-connect device to Internet without proxy, and perform above tasks via console interface again.


Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • Network connection unavailability can be reported with proper message for each package management command.
  • Package management commands of console interface function as GUI client applications once the network connection becomes recovered.

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_RemovePkg_001
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands

Run Instructions:

  1. Find a installed package
  2. Remove the package by using commmand: pkcon remove Your_pkg

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo console interface functions as GUI client applications.
  • The pakcage can be removed

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_UpdatePkg_001
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Enable all built-in MeeGo repos, and force GPG checking for package install/updates
  2. Connect device to Internet via system proxy setting
  3. Perform below package management tasks via MeeGo get-updates console interface: pkcon get-updates

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo get-updates console interface functions as GUI client applications.
  • User can find update information if there are some packages need to be updated

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_UpdatePkg_002
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Enable all built-in MeeGo repos
  2. Connect device to Internet without proxy
  3. Perform below package management tasks via MeeGo get-updates console interface: pkcon get-updates

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo get-updates console interface functions as GUI client applications.
  • User can find update information if there are some packages need to be updated

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_UpdatePkg_003
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Enable all built-in MeeGo repos, and force GPG checking for package update
  2. Connect device to Internet via system proxy setting
  3. Perform below package management tasks via MeeGo update console interface: pkcon update Your_pkg

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo update console interface functions as GUI client applications.
  • Users can be informed with appropriate messages if package management authentication or transaction fails. Update aborts without making any changes to your system.

  • Users can be informed with appropriate messages if package management authentication or transaction fails. Update aborts without making any changes to your system.

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_RepoList_001
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Make sure there are some build-in repo configuration files
  2. Use pkcon to check build-in repo list:  pkcon repo-list

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo update console interface functions as GUI client applications:  gpk-repo
  • Users can get repo information via the command

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_RepoList_002
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Make sure there are some build-in repo configuration files
  2. Use pkcon to check build-in repo list:  pkcon repo-list
  3. Use "pkcon repo-enable repo_id" to enable the repo
  4. The the repo status via "pkon repo-list"

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo update console interface functions as GUI client applications:  gpk-repo
  • Users can enable the specific repo

case.name: PackageManage_TextMode_RepoList_003
case.description:
Purpose:

Verify the package management actions can be performed by Packagekit console commands


Run Instructions:

  1. Make sure there are some build-in repo configuration files
  2. Use pkcon to check build-in repo list:  pkcon repo-list
  3. Use "pkcon repo-disable repo_id" to enable the repo
  4. The the repo status via "pkon repo-list"

Pass/Fail Criteria:

  • MeeGo update console interface functions as GUI client applications:  gpk-repo
  • Users can disable the specific repo
